name: ABC's & 123's Video Tutorial
description: Metal stamping is a lot of fun, and though it does take some practice to become proficient, it's definitely a worthwhile skill and fun to do! Being able to customize your piece of jewelry is most satisfying and a wonderful way to express a message! Michelle has been stamping for years and makes the most beautiful handstamped charms in our store. She generously shares ALL her tips and tricks in this video, and we hope that you'll be stamping like a pro soon, too! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email or accompanying the DVD, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! Email us at info@thebeadgallery.com with questions or for more information! • Our downloadable videos are available as DVD's for an additional fee. name: Athena Hammered Links Video Tutorial
description: Athena is the goddess of arts and crafts… Who better than to name these hammered silver droplets after? There is purity and strength in this silver, as well as malleability – all the qualities that we seek to find with in ourselves. Enjoy the rhythm and soothing effects of hammering wire! Then wear these symbols of strength and beauty, knowing that YOU created it! Michelle walks you through using a bench block, hammers, ring clamp, file, wire cutter, hole punch and other basic tools to make these powered links! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Basic Stringing: Crimping 2 Ways Video Tutorial
description: Straight stringing is the simplest and easiest way to make jewelry, but oftentimes the most overlooked technique - so we've assisted, fixed, and re-taught thousands of beaders over the years! We've combined two simple-to-understand videos that show you the basics of crimping using: 1) Crimping & Crimp Covers: reviews tube crimps, crimp covers, wire protectors and a crimping plier AND 2) Crimping with Twisted Crimps: reviews twisted crimps, wire protectors and chain nose pliers Both techniques are easy to follow, and have their own uses depending on the look you want. We actively use both ways in the store, and hope that you will enjoy having the same options! Enjoy the BONUS lightcatcher project at the end! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Basic Wire Wrap Video Tutorial
description: We've taught thousands of people how to wire wrap for well over a decade and now you can learn in the convenience of your own home!! Or refresh yourself! It's a simple step–by–step video using basic tools to create a perfect, centered loop every time! Not only do we show you the technique (repeatedly - as we do in our live classes), we show you how to join, add chain, add clasps and make easy projects. We wanted to this to be as detailed as possible, covering every question we've heard over the past 15 years! It does take some practice to make consistently beautiful loops, so please be patient with yourself, and enjoy the process. ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Beachcomber Necklace Kit (with Video Gift!)
description: Beachy girls who love the ocean..... must wear this necklace! It's a simple handmade ocean swirl (some think it looks like an ocean creature.. other say it's the waves...) either way, it looks great with the recycled glass, a Hawaiian puka shell, a drilled gemstone and a sterling bead cap! Top it off with it being adjustable, and you are ready to relax and go with the flow! RIGHT NOW, it comes with a free video tutorial on how to make this necklace, including the adjustable sliding knot technique with the chinese knotting cord. We will email you the online link to the 16 minute downloadable video tutorial as a thank-you gift! If you want a DVD copy instead, let us know. It's only $8 more! Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you have any questions!

name: Binding at The Bead Gallery Video Tutorial
description: This is one of the first techniques we teach to first-time beaders when they walk through our door! Easy to master, fun to do and quick.... the trifecta of beading techniques! Take a simple pair of hoops, or a plain pendant and make them amazing by embellishing them with tiny crystals or gems along the edges! Binding is a magical treatment that takes blah to bling! Embellish not only the front or outside edge of your frame... you can bind on the inside of your shape too! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email or accompanying the DVD, a PDF with additional detailed information about the prain pendant and make them amazing by embellishing them with tiny cryoject, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Bodhi Bracelet Video Tutorial
description: This is an "old-school" technique called macrame... come back to life in the age of the power bracelets, spiritual wellness and men's jewelry This technique is also popularly known as the Shamballa bracelet that everyone's wearing these days! In this video, I'll show you how to do a series of knots with your choice of gemstones and how to end with a button clasp or with end crimps! It's a relaxing and fun technique that we call the "bodhi" bracelet, because bodhi means enlightment or awakening! I hope you experience such when you make this project! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Bodhi Bracelet Kit (with Video Tutorial Gift!)
description: 'Bodhi' translates to awakening or enlightenment. We hope you experience this as you knot this beautiful bracelet! Four different kits to chose from: harmony, strength, hope, or love (prices vary). *Purchase a kit and we will email you the online links to the downloadable video and accompanying PDF as a thank-you gift! If you want a DVD copy instead, let us know! Harmony Kyanite is wonderful for harmonious communication! Helps us access the message in our hearts, and be able to speak our truth with love and compassion. (Kit uses leather and the toggle + findings in only this kit are sterling silver!) Hope Freshwater pearls are wonderful for hope, faith, charity and innocence. Wear this and allow yourself to feel sincere in all that you do and feel! (Kit uses leather) Focus & Ground Onyx is a stone of inner strength and willpower - especially in times of mental or physical stress. Onyx is great for grounding when you are feeling nervous, helping you stay strong and true to yourself! (Kit uses satin cording) Strength Turquoise is like the daily multivitamin of stones! It is a protector, a source of strength, a healer, an energizer and it even helps us access a peaceful place within our hearts. (Kit uses leather) This is a complete ready-to-go kit! It includes the 20 minute Bodhi Bracelet Downloadable Video Tutorial, and all the supplies you need to make the bracelet pictured. If you would prefer another color of cording, please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com and we will see what is available. shamballa shambala bracelet

name: Dainty Pearl Bodhi Bracelet Kit (with Video Tutorial Gift!)
description: We made this dainty freshwater pearl bracelet with a macrame knotted hug of waxed linen around it.. so it's natural, beautiful and fresh! Just like you! We did a special video for this one, step-by-step, because it ends differently than our 3 other bodhi bracelet techniques... thus increasing your problem-solving skills and ability to adapt to any thread! 'Bodhi' translates to awakening or enlightenment and it applies to this bracelet in many ways! The kit includes everything you need to make this bracelet, including silver fill findings. We will email you the online link to the 10 minute downloadable video tutorial as a thank-you gift! If you want a DVD copy instead, let us know. It's only $8 more! ONLINE SPECIAL! Buy 1 kit at $25, and all additional kits are $5 off in the same order! Gemstones and charms are not included. Email us at info@thebeadgallery.com with questions or for more information and we will pick matching colors for you!

name: Mini Rainbow Bodhi Bracelet Kit (with Video Tutorial Gift!)
description: We made this dainty bracelet in a rainbow of colors, to represent acceptance, love and the beauty all around us! The kit includes everything you need to make this bracelet, including silver fill findings. We will email you the online links to the 16 minute downloadable video as a thank-you gift! name: Vintage Wood Bodhi Bead Bracelet
description: The Bodhi Bracelet! It's a simple macrame technique that you can end with a button and loop closure, combining wood, leather and a plated button! It's relaxing AND fun! All the supplies you need to make this bracelet are included in this kit, and if you aren't sure how easy it is... watch Michelle make one! Click here to see a free Vintage Wood Bodhi Bracelet Quick Tutorial! And if you prefer more detailed instructions, purchase our 20 minute original Bodhi Bracelet downloadable video tutorial. Check out our Bodhi Bracelet Video Tutorial and add it to your cart! If you would prefer a different color leather, please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com and we can help you out!

description: The Briolette wrap, aka "tip-drill" wrap can be one of the most difficult things to master and execute so that it looks clean, precise and consistent every time you do it! We've practiced, revised and taught it thousands of times for over a decade, and after many requests, are sharing it as a step-by-step instructional video and PDF for you to easily follow! name: Silk Road Glitzy Glam Video Tutorial
description: This "Silk Road" version of the Glitzy Glam bracelet features the SAME binding technique as seen in the original "Glitzy Glam" video tutorial! Then why'd we make another one? Because in teaching and explaining this version, we realized that that the start and finish of this was completely different, and that a video would be most helpful! In this "Silk Road", we show you how to work with a shorter and thicker silk cord with a beginning and ending that's wonderful if you want to wrap with leather, ribbon, or anything thicker! Because the original "glitzy glam" covers the same technique, tips and pointers, this video is less detailed, priced as an "add-on", and we suggest that you own both! We've increased the size of the base cord and the binding cord, and came up with a NEW way to start and end this project in order to accommodate the larger cords. We even added a coil component to add to the deluxe sophistication! ---------------------------------------------------------- • You will also receive a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! Email us at info@thebeadgallery.com with questions or for more information! • Video Length Combined: 6.5 (Silk Road) + 14 (Deluxe) = 20.5 minutes

name: Happy Bead Bangle Video Tutorial
description:
Happy Bead Bangle came about after students asked if there were options to using a bracelet mandrel!  JoAnn and I created this bangle, and reinforced it with wire wraps to make a stronger and springier bangle!  We do recommend using a bracelet mandrel, as there really is no substitute for hammering to harden and strengthen.. but sometimes a girl's gotta do… what a girl's gotta do!!  We get the job done!

We show you how to shape it on an everyday household cleaning can, and also demonstrate the metal bracelet mandrel in action as well.  Good luck, and have fun!! That's all the really matters!

----------------------------------------------------------
• The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer.

name: Knotting with Jamie! Video Tutorial
description: Knotting is fun, easy and has awesome results in the feel and the "lay" of the thread. Beads knotted or strung on cord have a softer, more touchable feel, and it carries so much of our love and intention with every knot that we make! Personally, I love to knot because it relaxes me, and puts me in a meditative and calming space. I hope you enjoy it too! This video includes the "Baby Knots" technique as an added bonus at the end of the DVD! Pretty cute stuff :) ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Kumihimo Big Boy Braid Video Tutorial
description: Kumihimo is an ancient Japanese technique of braiding that's been adapted to a modern-day, lightweight foam disc. This braid is something that we came up with while playing around with the disc! We KNOW that there is has got to be a traditional japanese name for this braid, however we just call is the "Big Boy", cause the first time I made it, I used thick leather and ended up with an 8mm diameter bracelet - which is super duper awesome!! The technique is simple and repetitive, so it's great to relax or travel with! We've also included how to end the kumihimo by tying it off.. that way, you'll be able to keep whipping these braids out! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Kumihimo with Beads Video Tutorial
description: If you're the kind of gal that loves LOTS of information, tips, tricks and maybe even MORE info than you necessarily need... you'll LOVE this video on how to kumihimo on the foam disc with beads! It's STUFFED with explanations, demonstrations, and alternative endings, so that you'll know how to troubleshoot ANY problem that could come along! It's almost as if my finger were stuck on the record button, and Michelle was compelled to share EVERYTHING she knew about kumihimo. WOW! that's all i got to say... the end. This partners with the Kumihimo Rainbow Promise Bracelet Bead Kit!! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! Please allow for up to 48 hours to get this link (but most likely much sooner than that!!) ---------------------------------------------------------- Here is what one of our customers had to say about the DVD: Just wanted to say thank you again! I was able to get everything all together and start weaving. Great job on the DVD! I was thinking the braiding might be tiring with the beads but it's so much fun! – Cathy P.

name: Kumihimo Rainbow "Promise" Bracelet Kit - Beads Only (with Video Tutorial Gift!)
description: We chose 18 double AB colors of 3mm Swarovski to blend and flow into a crystal rainbow. So when you are feeling down and out, or just need an optimistic outlook, use this "special blend" to bring balance and harmony to your mind, body and heart. The rainbow is a symbol of transformation, promises and hope. It is inclusive and embracing - reminding us that we can maintain separate identities and still beautifully mingle together! Though we specifically counted and labeled this crystal kit for the "Kumihimo with Beads" video project, you can use the colors in any project you wish (such as spiral rope or any seed bead project). The kumihimo braided bracelet was designed with special intentions in mind: acceptance, gratitude, love, joy, and the ability to "go with the flow". Wear your bracelet with the promise of good things to come! Feel energized, focused, and present in your body. This kit has been made with lots of LOVE! As YOU make this bracelet, fill it with YOUR intentions so that every time this bracelet is worn, it carries all the love in your heart. With your purchase of this kit, the Kumihimo with Beads downloadable video is our gift to you! We will email you a link after we receive your paypal payment. If you want the DVD, it's only $8 more. If you only need the video instructional for this bracelet, click here Kumihimo with Beads Video Tutorial, for more info! Please email us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you need the findings and threads to make this bracelet, or for more information!

options.name: Kumihimo Rainbow "Promise" Bracelet Kit - Beads Only

name: Lattice Wrap Bracelet Video Tutorial
description: Made so popular by the organic look and feel of the "chan luu" bracelet, here is our version, using a easy to do, double thread technique! While we have tried a single thread technique, we've discovered that we can keep our tension and move our hands much more easily with a "double" thread technique - and we think you will love it as much as our customers do! We will walk you through the project step by step, and we also offer kits to make this project! We've also included a BONUS at the end: how to add 2 hole beads!! ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email or accompanying the DVD, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! The lotus is a such a beautiful flower with so much symbolism behind the petals, that we did our best to teach you how to make it, as to honor the meaning of the flower, and the time + energy that you will put in to making it. It's like taking me & Michelle home in your picture box, and then if you have questions, we welcome you to review the included handout, drop in, email or call! name: Stretchy Cord Bracelet Video Tutorial
description: Stretchy Cord Bracelets are super easy to wear, and easy to make! We LOVE them at The Bead Gallery, because it allows us to wear our most favorite beads, and still have the quick and easy option to cut it apart if we want to make something else. AND in the meantime, your most beautiful beads can be admired and enjoyed! We string them with 4 cords for extra strength, and two "special" knots that hold really well. We stand behind this technique, and on any given day, you'll see at least 3-5 being worn on our staff! We also recommend using one of our modified clipboards - but that's for another story..... ---------------------------------------------------------- • The video can be watched online for up to a year, and you are welcome to download it to your computer. • You will also receive via email or accompanying the DVD, a PDF with additional detailed information about the project, supplies and tools! • Contact us if you want us to create a custom kit for you, to accompany your video lesson! name: Kauai Strawberry Instructional Booklet
description: A sweet treat to help you get started with beadweaving! Our full color, step by step instructional booklet makes it super simple! The Inspiration - On a staff trip to Kauai, we decided to turn this popular class into a booklet - thus the name! On the way home to Honolulu, we raced against the clock (it's a 14 minute flight), to see if each of us could complete a strawberry in that time! Hooray, the three of us did! We also make strawberry kits by request (hundreds of colors available- they are $15 with everything you need included!) Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you are interested! Technique: Beadweaving Skill Level: Beginner

name: Kauai Strawberry Kit (small) - Complete!

The small red strawberry uses 4mm bicones and measures at 3/4". This kit was custom made to accompany our full color, step by step Kauai Strawberry instructional booklet. name: Maui Pineapple Instructional Booklet
description: A sparkly piece of paradise ... not only are pineapples delicious, they are also a symbol of friendship in Hawaii! One day at work, I was thinking about HOW SPECIAL it must have been (back in the day) to receive a pineapple as a gift when someone went on a seafaring journey to unknown faraway destinations... that's how the pineapple became a symbol of friendship, by the way. So I asked Michelle to make me a crystal pineapple... and this is what she came up with! Our full color, step by step instructional booklet is super easy to follow (with lots of pictures!). We also have pineapple kits available. Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you are interested! We can customize your crystal colors to the traditional "pineapple" color, or pink (my personal fave), or blue.... Technique: Beadweaving Skill Level: Intermediate

They symbolize deep friendship and loyalty, with beautiful colors to bestow upon the recipient the wish for a brilliant and happy life. name: Temari Charm Kit for LOVE!
description: Temari balls are a folk art that developed in Japan - traditionally constructed of silk fabric and thread. They symbolize deep friendship and loyalty, with beautiful colors to bestow upon the recipient the wish for a brilliant and happy life. These LOVE charm kits were blessed with intentions of love, healing, peace and joy. The silver accented charm assists with inner reflection and awareness of love. The gold assists with outward expression and communication of love. Choose carefully with that in mind, to strengthen where your heart needs assistance, and knowing that we send love, support and aloha! The "stuffing bead" can be upgraded to a beautiful rose quartz. Rose Quartz enhances ALL forms of love – heals the heart and emanates unconditional love for ourselves and others around us! Who doesn't need that?? This kit was custom made to accompany our full color, step by step Temari Charm instructional booklet. (The booklet is not included with this kit, please purchase separately) We also make custom color temari charm kits AND finished charms (with an additional labor charge). Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you are interested! We would love to make your wishes come true!

name: Tiny Turtle Instructional Booklet
description: Yay! Tiny Turtle wants to go home with you! Our full color, step by step instructional booklet is super easy to follow (with lots of pictures!). We also have turtle kits available (regular & mini-sized). Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you are interested! Technique: Beadweaving Skill Level: Intermediate

name: Tiny Turtle Kit
description: Slow poke no more... tiny turtle travels with you at your pace! Now you can have your very own pet turtle! It's a dream come true for me.. no feeding or bathing... just enjoy :) Tiny Turtles are the CUTEST and luckiest of our charms. This kit was custom made to accompany our full color, step by step Tiny Turtle instructional booklet. (The booklet is not included with this kit, please purchase separately) We also make custom color turtle charm kits AND finished charms (with an additional labor charge). Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you are interested! We would love to make your wishes come true!

name: Beachcomber Bits Kit
description: A goodie bag stuffed with shells, recycled glass, coral and tiny gems! We've made an awesome combo of beads for you to enjoy! With one kit, you can straight string 2 bracelets (seed beads not included), crochet, knot or baby knot these cuties, and you'll feel like a beachy girl right away! Focals are not included, so if you want one... let us know! We are happy to choose a great one for you! Want to see how it's made? Click on this: Beachcomber Bits Kit Video Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you are have any questions!

name: Gem Infusion Kits!
description: A perfect blend to practice your wire wrapping or knotting skills with! Each one is a hand–picked, custom blended elixir with specific gemstones for your well–being and enjoyment! We made limited quantities of the following: courage infusion: base notes of citrine, carnelian & freshwater pearl love infusion: base notes of pink opal, rose quartz & freshwater pearl calm infusion: base notes of prehnite, crystal quartz & freshwater pearl Add our recommended specialty stones to customize your "blend" & maximize its power. They are wonderful for basic wire wrap, knotting, or straight stringing! You can even tailor it to your specific needs, with the accompanying handy gemstone card included with the kits! Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you have any questions!

name: Gemmy Bits Kits!
description: Each one is a hand–picked, custom blended elixir with specific gemstones for your well–being and enjoyment! These super special gem kits were made with lots of love and support for our friends and loved ones! We sorted through the tiniest of gems and pearls, keeping our most basic desires for LOVE, CREATIVITY and PERSONAL POWER as a focus in our minds and hearts. Choose from the following gemmy bits: I am loved! An elixir of chalcedony, emerald, labradorite, pink opal, freshwater pearl, rose quartz, prehnite, blue lace agate, moonstone & swarovski crystals. I am joyful! An elixir of tourmaline, lemon quartz, pyrite, yellow jasper, ruby, freshwater pearl, citrine, carnelian, amber, shell, moonstone & Swarovski crystals. I am creative! An elixir of turquoise, freshwater pearl, smoky quartz, mandarin garnet, moonstone, citrine, pyrite & Swarovski crystals. I am empowered! An elixir of turquoise, tiger eye, lapis, freshwater pearl, malachite, black tourmaline, garnet, agate, sodalite & Swarovski crystals. You can use these kits easily in: mini crochet, gemmy rings (which we have a for) and baby knots (also featured as a bonus on the Knotting with Jamie DVD). Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you are have any questions!

name: Tree of Life Bead Kit - Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter
description:
A hand-selected mix of gemstones and pearls. ♥ Spring: green & pink for love, rebirth, renewal & growth.

♥ Summer: orange & yellow for energy, confidence, strength, harmony & relaxation.

♥ Fall: brown, red & purple for grounding, healing, being present, reflection & knowledge.

♥ Winter: white, silver & grey for hope, reflection & dreams.

You can make a seasonal tree of life tree (as pictured) or use your kit in your wire or thread projects. The possibilities are endless! Please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com if you have any questions!

name: Tumbled Gem Cures - Grounding • Strength & Courage • Energy
description: "I am grounded, I am safe, I am loved" These gems are blessed in Hawaii with love, light, aloha! Stash them in your purse or pocket, tuck one under your pillow ... Keep them close as a reminder that YOU are worthy, valuable, and deserving of love. You ARE loved ... everyday!!! Choose from the following gem cures (priced below): ♥ GROUNDING stones: bloodstone (determination), hematite (balancing grounding), labradorite (strengthens will), smoky quartz (focus), & apache tears (healing) - $11 ♥ STRENGTH & COURAGE stones: carnelian (courage), malachite (protection), crystal quartz (stability), lapis lazuli (release stress) & chrysocolla (strength, courage & leadership) - $22 ♥ ENERGY stones: dumortierite (self confidence), red tiger eye (composure & energy), gold tiger eye (vitality), rutilated quartz (activates) & turquoise ("multi-vitamin") - $26 If you are interested in buying stones separately or have a custom request/question, please e-mail us at info@thebeadgallery.com
